obfuscation: ﻿ Evaluation - English , My English !
original: ﻿ Evaluation - English, My English!

obfuscation: Recently , not a lot more than a month ago actually , a thrombosis was found in my brain .
original: Recently, not much more than a month ago actually, a thrombosis was found in my brain.

obfuscation: And as if that were not bad enough , the thrombosis had caused several cerebral haemorrhages .
original: And as if that was not bad enough, the thrombosis had caused several cerebral haemorrhages.

obfuscation: Part of the reason to why this was discovered was that I lost my ability to speak and write - I simply did n't know the words , or the letters for that matter , and I could not spell at all .
original: Part of the reason to why this was discovered was that I lost my ability to speak and write - I simply didn't know the words, or the letters for that matter, and I could not spell at all.

obfuscation: I 'm not completely healed from this yet , but I am a lot , much better .
original: I'm not completely healed from this yet, but I am much, much better.

obfuscation: Luckily neither the thrombosis or the haemorrhages has made any lasting harm to my brain , according to the doctors .
original: Luckily neither the thrombosis or the haemorrhages has done any lasting harm to my brain, according to the doctors.

obfuscation: But because of this it 's kind of hard for me to say how good or bad I am in the different areas of the English language right nowadays .
original: But because of this it's kind of hard for me to say how good or bad I am in the different areas of the English language right now.

obfuscation: But I know that I 've always loved words and sentences , stories and text , and not merely the English ones .
original: But I know that I've always loved words and sentences, stories and text, and not just the English ones.

obfuscation: Since I was fourteen , I 've been wanting to move to England .
original: Since I was fourteen, I've been wanting to move to England.

obfuscation: And I know that before this illness of mine I used to think of myself as a pretty good English speaker , when it comes to pronunciation and finding the right words - at least for someone who has never been to England or the US .
original: And I know that before this illness of mine I used to think of myself as a pretty good English speaker, when it comes to pronunciation and finding the right words - at least for someone who has never been to England or the US.

obfuscation: But most of the time I 'm a bit besides shy to speak as much as I ought to , I think .
original: But most of the time I'm a bit too shy to speak as much as I ought to, I think.

obfuscation: So , you 'd remember that a person who speaks quite good English also is good at listening , but I 'm not .
original: So, you'd think that a person who speaks quite good English also is good at listening, but I'm not.

obfuscation: It 's not that I do n't understand , more like I do n't learn what people are saying .
original: It's not that I don't understand, more like I don't hear what people are saying.

obfuscation: I have bad hearing , I 'm aware of that , but this might be because of something else .
original: I have bad hearing, I'm aware of that, but this might be because of something else.

obfuscation: I do n't know .
original: I don't know.

obfuscation: One thing I 'm certain has been effected by my thrombosis is my spelling .
original: One thing I'm sure has been effected by my thrombosis is my spelling.

obfuscation: I 've gone from being a person who makes few mistakes when it comes to spelling to being a person who 's really bad at it .
original: I've gone from being a person who makes few mistakes when it comes to spelling to being a person who's really bad at it.

obfuscation: I loose letters and sometimes even whole words .
original: I loose letters and sometimes even whole words.

obfuscation: The same thing happens when I read , I precisely do n't know the words in front of me sometimes , not even the most simple ones .
original: The same thing happens when I read, I just don't know the words in front of me sometimes, not even the most simple ones.

obfuscation: And I 'm absolutely certain it was n't this way before I got ill .
original: And I'm absolutely sure it wasn't this way before I got ill.

obfuscation: But enough about my illness !
original: But enough about my illness!

obfuscation: No .
original: No.

obfuscation: I 've never been a good reader , not even when I read swedish text .
original: I've never been a good reader, not even when I read swedish text.

obfuscation: But still I love books .
original: But still I love books.

obfuscation: Unfortunately I do n't seem to be able to find the time to sit down and read .
original: Unfortunately I don't seem to be able to find the time to sit down and read.

obfuscation: But I do realise I want to do that more often .
original: But I do realise I need to do that more often.

obfuscation: Do n't get me wrong here .
original: Don't get me wrong here.

obfuscation: I 'm not what you 'd call a `` bad reader '' .
original: I'm not what you'd call a "bad reader".

obfuscation: I understand the text perfectly well , perhaps better than some early people , who would consider themselves to be good readers , it 's just that I read very slowly .
original: I understand the text perfectly well, perhaps better than some other people, who would consider themselves to be good readers, it's just that I read very slowly.

obfuscation: But I do n't remember that is that much of a problem .
original: But I don't think that is that much of a problem.

obfuscation: So , what have I got left ?
original: So, what have I got left?

obfuscation: Writing of course !
original: Writing of course!

obfuscation: I love to write !
original: I love to write!

obfuscation: I 've written three and a half full length books , in swedish though .
original: I've written three and a half full length books, in swedish though.

obfuscation: But I also love to write in English .
original: But I also love to write in English.

obfuscation: I have a homepage on the internet and on one of the pages there , called `` stories '' my boyfriend and I write a new shorter story every week .
original: I have a homepage on the internet and on one of the pages there, called "stories" my boyfriend and I write a new shorter story every week.

obfuscation: It 's thus much fun and to judge from the comments we 've been getting from our visitors , we 're pretty good at it too .
original: It's so much fun and to judge from the comments we've been getting from our visitors, we're pretty good at it too.

obfuscation: And yes , I agree .
original: And yes, I agree.

obfuscation: I 'd like to think of myself as a good author , at least when it comes to fiction .
original: I'd like to think of myself as a good author, at least when it comes to fiction.

obfuscation: Essays , like this one , are a bit harder to write , but I have not had that many chances to practice , and nobody has shown me what it should be like .
original: Essays, like this one, are a bit harder to write, but I have not had that many chances to practice, and nobody has shown me what it should be like.

obfuscation: When I said I thought of myself as a good writer I did n't necessarily mean that my grammar is good besides , because it 's not , not always .
original: When I said I thought of myself as a good writer I didn't necessarily mean that my grammar is good too, because it's not, not always.

obfuscation: I just happen to have studied a some swedish grammar , which I try to apply to the English language , and sometimes the two do n't really meet .
original: I just happen to have studied a some swedish grammar, which I try to apply to the English language, and sometimes the two don't really match.

obfuscation: But in total I guess you could say that I 'm one of these mediocre students who wants to become a teacher in English because of a genuine interest in language rather than high skills .
original: But in total I guess you could say that I'm one of these mediocre students who wants to become a teacher in English because of a genuine interest in language rather than high skills.

obfuscation: And therefor , I guess , will have to work heavily to pass this education , but who , for the same reason , will find that it 's worth it .
original: And therefor, I guess, will have to work hard to pass this education, but who, for the same reason, will find that it's worth it.
